cab.content: WAR CABINET.iTHE PRIGS OF MILE.Staffordshire Chamber of Agriculture, Wolverhaiapton District, 48 Queen Street, Wo1ve rhampton,18th August 1917.Dear Sir,I ara instructed to forward you the following resolution which was passed at a meeting of this branch of the Chamber of Agriculture on Wednesday last.That this meeting is of opinion that the Government in fixing an arbitrary price for milk, while doing nothing to reduce cost of production,, or consider local conditions, will not only reduce production but prevent many contracts being carried out. *Yours faithfully,(Sd) H. Eook.The Presidentof the War Cabinet,2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W.COPY OF E380IUTIOIJ.
